casebody.data:
SEAPORT CAPITAL PARTNERS, LLC
v.
SHERI SPEER SEAPORT CAPITAL PARTNERS, LLC
v.
Sheri Spear Seaport Capital Partners, LLC
v.
Sheri Speer et al. Seaport Capital Partners, LLC
v.
76-78 Truman Street, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 29, 2019 Edward Bona, self-represented, in support of the petition. Lloyd L. Langhammer, Norwich, in opposition.

The petition of the plaintiff in error for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 1 , 171 A.3d 472 (2017), is denied.
